subject: [Ip-health] Dates of WIPO General Assembly: Sept 24, 2007 to October 3, 2007
body:
The dates of the WIPO General Assembly which will take place in Geneva,
Switzerland have been set from: September 24, 2007 to October 3, 2007.

The link below jumps to the draft agenda prepared by the WIPO
Director-General.

http://www.wipo.int/meetings/en/doc_details.jsp?doc_id=76473
